name: Cube Survival
description:
The goal is simple: Don’t touch the shapes, but the over-the-top illusions of shadows add an additional layer of difficulty.
Collect hidden stars to unlock new characters. Solve challenging puzzles and rise higher to avoid what lies beneath the shade.

FEATURES
• Dozens of Challenging Puzzles to Solve
• Cool Shadow Illusion & Haunting Special Effects
• Collect the Hidden Stars!
